About.Acquisition focus: Internal documents related to the operations of St Patrick's Province (Victoria, Tasmania) from 1953 to 2007. Some student records, school registers, documents and photographs associated with the schools the Brothers have vacated.

About.Major holdings:
Brothers' Communities documents
	Correspondence of the Province Leadership Team
	Province Newsletters
	Certain records of schools Brothers have vacated
	Various books including school histories, Brothers' theses and written works of the Brothers
